name: Kazakhstani Australian Mineral Mix (Calcite & Black Australian Opal)
description: Natural resources from two countries collaged into one, seemingly binary, yet multifaceted. Forces of push and pull forge spaces of existence between cultures. This image is symbolic of the physical traits from two races recognizable and perpetually on display and also addresses topics such as identity, immigration politics, and conservation. These visual signifiers of race, in some cases, reinforce essentialist, either/or thinking and harmful stereotypes.
